Posts.Content: Nov 17, 2010 06:08AM BRCA1 wrote: Thank you for responding. I don't understand how ultrasound and xray doesn't show anything , but MRI does. Size freaks me out a lot, it is big, how can ultrasound do not pick it up? When I had cyst in my breast few years ago , it was 0.5 cm and ultrasound was showing it clearly. Does that mean what ever my sister has is not a cyst, since it is not showing up ?  fortunate1, did you had pain all the time or it was coming and going?
Posts.Title: MRI showed 1.8cm ...plus pain???HELP BRCA1 fortunate1

Posts.Content: BRCA1 wrote: Hi, I am asking on behalf of my sister and really need some opinions and advice as I am scared and I am sure she is scared even more, so please respond. 26 years old, BRCA1+, no cancer dx. MRI - July 2010 . "Something" with irregular shape ( long, not round), 1.8 cm . MRI - November 2010. All stayed the same. Beginning of November she start to have pain in that breast . Pain feels like a bruise and it is constant and doesn't go away. Ultrasound and Xray didn't show anything, only MRI picks it up. Please , honestly, tell me your opinions? She have app with Dr on Monday, but before that...can it be nothing to worry about, I mean, she is so young ?   BRCA1+ , had PBM nipple spearing AlloDerm recon on Nov 25th'10 lifewithbrca.blogspot.com/ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: MRI showed 1.8cm ...plus pain???HELP BRCA1 fortunate1
